summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Charcoal Teeth Whitening Powder,from Organic Coconut Shell and Food Grade Formula - All Natural Freshmint Flavor Tooth Whitener 30 g by Gemmaz
Review Date: 2016/02/14
Store: NUTRILUSH
Product Description: ['How To Use:', '1. Wet toothbrush.2. Dip brush into charcoal powder.3. Brush gently for 1-2 minutes, paying special attention to stained teeth.4. Rinse mouth well with water.', 'Cautions:', '-Charcoal can stain grout and fabrics. Protect counters, floors and clothing before using.- If you have crowns, caps or porcelain veneers, it’s possible that activated charcoal may stain them.- Keep out of reach of children.- Avoid contact with eyes. - Stop use if irritation Occurs.', 'Storage Conditions:', '(1)It should be stored in cool and dryplace. Pleaseavoid direct sunlight and do not expose to any high temperature.(2)Our teeth whitening powder can remove most of teeth stains from coffee, wine, tea and tobacco. But this product is not bleach. If your enamel is naturally discolored, this product will not help whiten, but is still an excellent natural daily toothpaste alternative!', 'Ingredients:', 'Activated Charcoal from Coconut, Calcium Carbonate, Sorbitol, Sodium Bicarbonate, Cellulose Microcrystalline, DendrobiumOfficinale Kimura et Migo, Resveratrol, Natural Freshmint Flavor, Stevia']
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 5.5 x 1.1 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'NUTRILUSH'}
Review Text: These multi-colored, multi-use clips can be used for a variety of projects. This resealable bag contains 100 of the clips. The spring mechanism on the clips is of adequate strength for use in many arts and crafts applications. Having the mix of colors is useful. These are both attractive and practical, and this is a good value for this number of clips. I was provided a free sample of these for my honest, unbiased review.
Review Title: Great bag of multi-colored wonder clips for crafts
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack)
Review Date: 2018/12/21
Store: POWERGROOMING
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'}
Review Text: This is a basic nail clipping set with a clipper and file. The clipper has a nice look and a smooth cut, with a special material on its edge (feels like silicone) that makes it easy and comfortable to grip. There is a storage case with a snap to close it. If you need these simple nail clipping tools this set is fine, though a bit expensive.
Review Title: A nail clipper and file with storage case
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nail Clipper Set, 19 In 1 Manicure Pedicure Ear Picking Tool Set, Tools For Nail, Cutter Kits, Includes Cuticle Remover with Portable, Nail Tools with Luxurious Travel Case
Review Date: 2019/01/24
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.22 x 3.31 x 0.91 inches; 9.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '759675599820'}
Review Text: This is a set of manicure and pedicure tools that includes pretty much all the clippers and instruments you would need to use. These function well and they also have an attractive design that will appeal especially to girls. The case is nice and it matches the tools. This would make a nice gift.
Review Title: An attractive, flashy manicure/pedicure tool set
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eye Mask Natural Mulberry 100% Silk Super Smooth Sleep Eye Mask for Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes for Dry Eyes for Dark Circles Sleeping Travel While Camping Multi Purpose Men and Women Eye Mask
Review Date: 2019/02/28
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.3 x 1.6 x 0.4 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: This eye mask fits comfortably and feels smooth on your face. It functions as desired for blocking out light and helping you relax and sleep. It is not substantially different than other silk eye masks I have tried, while it is not the least expensive option and it doesn't come with any box or bag to store it in.
Review Title: A simple smooth silk eye mask
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wig Head Wig Stands (Purple)
Review Date: 2020/08/12
Store: BAIHONG
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Manufacturer': 'XUCHANG BAIHONG HAIR PRODUCTS CO., LTD.'}
Review Text: This package includes a pair of scalp massaging brushes along with a stretchable shower cap. The brushes have points with silicone tips so you can safely stimulate your scalp as you wash your head and hair. They feel OK, though not as good as manually massaging your scalp since the brush doesn't have the dexterity of fingers. These are nice to have although I don't expect to rely on them too much. For what is included in this package it seems reasonably priced.
Review Title: Silicone tipped scalp massage brushes along with shower hair cap
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AUGNORYE 13 Pcs Hair Cutting Scissors Kit, Professional Hair Barber Scissors Kit with Thinning Shears, Home Hair Shears for Women, Men, Kids
Review Date: 2020/08/15
Store: AUGNORYE
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AUGNORYE', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel'}
Review Text: This barber kit includes scissors, combs, and other items used by barbers. This all fits in a carry bag and would be fine for any amateur or professional hair stylist. The items are good quality and are affordably priced when you purchase them all together in this kit.
Review Title: Everything you'd need for manual hair cutting
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings
Review Date: 2020/08/22
Store: Cherry
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'}
Review Text: This package comes with two amber glass bottles that include spray tops. The bottles are wrapped with bubble wrap so they don't crack during transit. The labels are a black color suitable for writing on with liquid chalk markers - so you would need that type of marker, which isn't included with the labels here. These bottles function as intended and are useful if you wish to avoid plastic.
Review Title: Amber glass bottles with spray tops and labels
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine)
Review Date: 2020/09/01
Store: PRETTY FRANK
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
Review Text: This deodorant comes in a glass jar and is made with simple, natural ingredients that are good for your skin and provide pleasant aromas. Baking soda, coconut oil, shea butter, and vitamin E are included along with some natural essential oils that add a pleasant aroma. This company offers different scent options - this one is rather flowery, with scents like ylang ylang and gardenia. This is certainly somewhat expensive for a deodorant but it is worth paying extra to get something natural with organic ingredients that won't irritate your skin or harm your health. Unlike some products that just spray on scents this item uses baking soda to help absorb odors too. This is something I would definitely suggest if you want a natural deodorant and don't mind applying something that is in a jar rather than a roll-on or spray container.
Review Title: Great natural deodorant with baking soda and essential oils
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Glass spray bottle-16 ounce empty bottle ounce refillable container 2 packs, suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants with mist and air flow settings
Review Date: 2020/09/17
Store: DS DOODLE SABBATH
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'DS DOODLE SABBATH', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable Nozzle', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '619011520959'}
Review Text: This box comes with 2 blue glass spray bottles that hold 16 fluid ounces each. The spray tops have an option to adjust the type of spray and you can also use a regular bottle top on these. This includes label stickers and plastic funnels so you can pour in what you wish to and label the contents with a liquid chalk marker. The bottles work as intended and this is a reasonable price for this type of glass bottle set.
Review Title: Pair of blue glass spray bottles with accessories
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Obsidian Roller and Gua Sha, Face Roller, 100% Natural Obsidian Stone Set, Dual Sided Face Massager, Stimulates Blood Flow, Relieves Stress, Reduces Signs of Aging, Travel Pouch Included, Gift Box
Review Date: 2020/09/24
Store: ZEN + ORIGIN
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '4 x 2 x 3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '703669115084'}
Review Text: This facial massage gift box includes both a roller and a polished gua sha stone. This is just like a jade roller set but with obsidian stones. Obsidian is a stone that is good for grounding, protection, and enhancing circulation, and it functions well for facial massage. This comes in an attractive dark colored gift box and is reasonably priced for this type of set.
Review Title: Cool obsidian stone facial massage roller with gua sha stone
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Argan Magic 100% Pure Argan Oil – Moisturizing Oil that Infuses Skin with Enriched Hydration | Leaves Skin Restored & Refreshed | Non-Greasy | Rich in Vitamin E | Made in USA | Cruelty Free (2 oz)
Review Date: 2020/09/29
Store: Argan Magic
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923474046'}
Review Text: This is a 2 ounce bottle of argan oil that is commonly used for body care, either by itself or in combination with other ingredients. The bottle top is OK for dispensing the oil though it would have been better to have a special dropper top. This is a nourishing oil that is worth trying if you want a natural skin care aid.
Review Title: Pure argan oil, good for hair and skin
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: TCM Men's Cleansing Activated Charcoal Bar Soap - For all skin types - 5oz (1 Pack)
Review Date: 2020/10/15
Store: TCM
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'TCM', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Youth', 'Package Dimensions': '3.7 x 2.01 x 1.34 inches; 5.26 Ounces', 'UPC': '851058008179'}
Review Text: This bar soap is a nice full size and includes cleansing natural ingredients. It is free of any harsh chemicals and it has a fairly mild added scent. I would personally leave out the added fragrance but otherwise this is a very good soap formula that nourishes the skin and cleanses with the power of activated charcoal.
Review Title: Full size bar soap with natural plant oils and activated charcoal
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Boar Bristle Hair Brush Set With Wide Tooth Tail Comb Natural Soft Hair Brushes For Women Kids Mens Hair Brush For Straightening Styling Smoothing Brush Adds Shine Fine Hair Brush For Men
Review Date: 2020/10/30
Store: Sonvera
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sonvera', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Fine, Thick, Thin', 'Material': 'Boar', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 3.23 x 1.89 inches; 5.68 Ounces', 'UPC': '353012722652'}
Review Text: This wood handled hair brush has strong boar bristles and comes with a storage pouch and a couple other hair care accessories. For this type of natural brush with the extras it is a good value, though not a bargain item.
Review Title: Solid natural boar bristle hair brush with comb and storage bag
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

They feel OK, though not as good as manually massaging your scalp since the brush doesn't have the dexterity of fingers. These are nice to have although I don't expect to rely on them too much. For what is included in this package it seems reasonably priced.
Review Title: Silicone tipped scalp massage brushes along with shower hair cap
Rating: 4.0

Product Title: Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine)
Review Date: 2020/09/01
Store: PRETTY FRANK
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
Review Text: This deodorant comes in a glass jar and is made with simple, natural ingredients that are good for your skin and provide pleasant aromas. Baking soda, coconut oil, shea butter, and vitamin E are included along with some natural essential oils that add a pleasant aroma. This company offers different scent options - this one is rather flowery, with scents like ylang ylang and gardenia. This is certainly somewhat expensive for a deodorant but it is worth paying extra to get something natural with organic ingredients that won't irritate your skin or harm your health. Unlike some products that just spray on scents this item uses baking soda to help absorb odors too. This is something I would definitely suggest if you want a natural deodorant and don't mind applying something that is in a jar rather than a roll-on or spray container.
Review Title: Great natural deodorant with baking soda and essential oils
Rating: 5.0

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Natural and Organic Products**: Strong preference for items with natural ingredients (e.g., charcoal, essential oils, shea butter). Consistent purchases in beauty and personal care highlight sustainability.
- **Self-Care and Grooming**: Regular purchases of grooming tools and personal care products (manicure/pedicure sets, hairbrushes, and face massage tools), indicating a focus on self-presentation.
- **Health-Oriented Choices**: Selection of products aimed at health benefits, such as teeth whitening and skin moisturizers that avoid harsh chemicals. A focus on skin nourishment and natural deodorants points to wellness-conscious habits.
- **Convenience and Multi-Functionality**: Items frequently chosen have versatile applications (e.g., multi-use clips, refillable spray bottles), emphasizing practicality.
- **Aesthetic Appeal**: Interest in attractive and thoughtfully designed products, as illustrated by choosing colorful or elegantly presented items.
- **Quality Over Quantity**: Preference for higher-rated products, indicating a desire for effective and durable choices rather than the cheapest options, often seeking value in quality craftsmanship.

target_interaction.title: Skin nourishing oil, mild scent, lots of ingredients
target_interaction.text: This is a 2 ounce bottle of this skin formula filled with nourishing plant oils (lipid is just a fancy way of referring to an oil). There is an impressive list of ingredients and no problematic chemical additives. This nourishes the skin and doesn't have a strong fragrance. It is somewhat expensive for the volume in the bottle, while it is a nice natural skin care option. The bottle is a dark glass bottle with a useful dropper top.
target_interaction.title_meta: Dr. Denese SkinScience Essential Lipid Anti Aging Power Infusion Dry Oil - Skin Nutrients 97% Organic 100% Natural - Rejuvinating Blend with Amaranth & Resveratrol - Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 2oz
features: PACKED WITH ORGANIC INGREDIENTS - A superior combination of organic dry oils extracted from amaranth, olive, macadamia, avocado, argan, rosehip and grapeseed for a combination of naturally sourced vitamins, antioxidants and bio flavonoids to penetrate rapidly without a greasy after feel. Delivers essential ingredients to the skin with just the right balance helps with the longevity of skin and works to restore the appearance of skin health. Made without parabens or dyes and not animal tested.

RESTORE & REJUVINATE SKIN - An exceptional blend of the most pure, nutrient dense essential fatty acid containing ingredients available. This ultimate blend of fast absorbing, natural dry oils is designed to help preserve, restore and rejuvenate the skin, to soften the look of lines, wrinkles, to improve firmness and elasticity, to reduce redness, irritation and dry parched skin.

NUTRIENTS FOR YOUR SKIN - Made with resveratrol, one of the most potent anti-oxidants and free radical scavenging agents. Combined with amaranth, which has an 8000- year-old history. The name Amaranth means “a flower that does not wilt” and it has come to symbolize immortality over the ages. Amaranth seed oil is remarkably rich is phytonutrients and bioflavonoids. The serum replenishes squalene which is a naturally occurring lipid in human skin that naturally depletes with age.
BENEFICIAL FOR ALL SKIN TYPES - Can be used on all skin types but most beneficial for dry to normal skin above age 35. This dry oil blend should be applied before your cream.

TESTED, TRUSTED QUALITY - We pride ourselves on quality of our products and perform product safety testing by third-party, independent, certified testing laboratories. We do not believe in animal testing and all of Dr. Denese products are manufactured under FDA-mandated procedures. The key is to use the RIGHT ingredients in the RIGHT percentages, because with skin care everything is in the percentages. Our goal is to give you an exceptionally high percentage of the key ingredients.
